sub_title:
Expert In Hawaiian Lomilomi, co-founder of Malamalomi school. 

CEO of InterX Clinic Benelux, pain management clinic.
summary:
Aloha,
Mahalo, Thank you, for visiting me. 

I understand you have the possibility to connect to millions of professionals on LinkedIn, so here is why you should connect with me.
The whole point is to connect with people that have a similar vision for healing and wellness. What does it mean? And how you can use your talents in the service of your clients to create a better lives and therefore a better world to live in?

Here's how i can serve you:

Is your practice  not as busy as you would like it to be?
Are you not using all your hidden talents?
Are you ready to become the expert in your field?
Are you ready to create the freedom in your life?
Are you ready to contribute to a better way of living?

If you got a YES to any of the above questions, then you want to listen to me.
Why would you listen to me? Well, better to get to know me a little, right?

 I Am an Expert in the field of body work (25 years experience)
 I Am a Trainer and Coach in the field of the MIND
 I Have been teaching in Massage Schools in Canada, Hawaii and Europe
 I Am the co-founder of Malamalomi School in The Netherlands

Learn from my Experience and Expertise. 

What can i teach you? HAWAIIAN STYLE,

 How to break Personal and Professional obstacles NOW
 How to build a successful massage practice Today
 How to Understand  the needs of your Target Clients
 How to maintain optimal energy levels to support all that you want to achieve
 And much more.

Everyday, somewhere in the world, ALOHA comes to life. As it lives and breathes, ALOHA defines the highest example of sincere, gracious and intuitively perfect service given from one person to another

Specialties:
 Hawaiian Values in business and life and their practical application
 Personal Development
 Public Speaking
 Ho'oponopono
 Motivational Training
 Team Building
 Lomilomi
 High Performance and Success coaching

Treat people as if they were what they ought to be, and you help them become what they are capable of being   Goethe 1749-1832

profile_positions.title: Expert in Hawaiian Lomilomi and Ho'oponopono
